issue.title: [Java] Support iterating a vector by ArrowBufPointer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6031](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6031). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Provide the functionality to traverse a vector (fixed-width vector & variable-width vector) by an iterator. This is convenient for scenarios when accessing vector elements in sequence.
